text: Zhenzhu yu yiselie de houyi que yi diyue, bing cong tamen zhong paichu shi'er ge shouling. Zhenzhu shuo:“Wo que yu nimen tong zai. Ruguo nimen jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quexin wo de zhong shizhe, bing xiezhu tamen, bing yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu, wo bi gouxiao nimen de zui'e, wo bi rang nimen jinru xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Cihou, shei bu xindao, shei yi mishile zhenglu.”
